title: Didn't get the Star Guardian Icon
body: I did the Quiz and it's the 3rd day and I still didn't get it, i'm getting a bit worried...

replies.body: Same here i did it when it came out and still no icon i did the test like 15 times and im worried.I'm not getting the icon am i it's been like a month :({{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}
I did the quiz so long ago and i still didn't receive the icon. Please, why is this? i got star guardian Janna.

It can take a few days to get the icon added to your account. A message at the end of the quiz makes sure to mention this as an effort to prevent confusion.

Let me know if you have any questions.
I did this on the day the quiz came, still havent gotten mine. Im starting to panic because i really want this icon...
In that case, reach out in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we'll take care of this for you.
Same here. I took the quiz three days ago and so did my friend, We took it at the same time, and shes already got hers and I havent yet{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
Same here. Took the quiz, linked the quiz to a friend. They got the icon right away, and I still haven't received it several days later. Hoping this gets resolved soon.{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}
I believe the website says it can take up to 7 days. Please be patient.
